title.narrative: Integrated Management of Natural Resources in the Watersheds of Georgia

description.narrative: Local people, youth and local governments of the target municipalities

The primary goal of the program is to improve the current and future lives of people in Georgia by utilizing and managing natural resources more sustainably. Targeted resources include water, soil, vegetation, and the ecosystems that encompass them.

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity
